name: tgol
description: Several cell-configurations compete in a tournament; Inspired by Conway's Game of Life

scripts.prepublish: coffee --compile --output lib src && npm run copy-dist && npm run browserify
scripts.test-debug: node-debug node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha  --recursive spec --require spec/helpers/chai.js --require coffee-script/register --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --no-timeouts --debug-brk
scripts.test-jenkins: JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=report.xml JUNIT_REPORT_STACK=1 mocha spec --recursive --require spec/helpers/chai.js --timeout 15000 --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter --require coffee-script/register --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register||true

author: Lukas Degener <l.degener@tarent.de>
